GapFillInput.Title: Remembering and forgetting
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct form of remember, learn, remind, forget, recognise or lose into each gap to make sentences.

Content.Question:
1. I can’t remember where I put my glasses.
2. I learnt|learned how to read music when I was quite young.
3. Don’t forget to add some salt.
4. Patsy always reminds me of her sister.
5. My son is learning|'s learning how to write his name at the moment.
6. When I got to the airport, I recognised Mr Kim from his photo.
7. Did you remember to lock the front door?
8. After the accident my brother lost his memory for a short time.
9. He often forgets to put enough petrol in the car.
10. Where did you lose your keys?
